s: The main reason I chose this brand is I earlier purchased their premium knit shorts for my husband to wear in the hospital after knee replacement surgery. He didn't think he would like those either but they were comfortable to wear in bed and gave him a modicum of privacy which he wanted. Often a knit fabric is either too flimsy or to heavy to drape well on the body. This is not the case with this particular style from Noble Mount...
